name: TriviaTime
0:
”Alexa, open trivia time”
”Alexa, start trivia time”
”Alexa, launch trivia time”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Trivia Time" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge across a variety of topics. Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each correct answer earns the user one point. Every ten questions, the user's score will be announced.

In multiplayer mode, which supports up to two players, scores are revealed every 20 questions.
